body.name: Miabella Italian Solid 925 Sterling Silver 3.5mm Diamond Cut Cuban Link Curb Chain Necklace for Women Men, Made in Italy
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 31 mins
features: MODERN CLASSIC - Add style to a basic look with this solid 925 sterling silver 3.5mm Curb chain. Our flat diamond-cut beveled links offer a much more reflective look than the standard curb chain for an elegant rich shine. Strong, durable and comfortable, this slim version of the classic Cuban is perfect for all ages and for any occasion. Wear alone with a casual or formal outfit for everyday modern elegance, with your favorite pendant for a personal statement or as a great layering chain.

REAL 925 STERLING SILVER - Crafted of pure 925 sterling silver to give your jewelry a brilliant shine. Sterling silver is hypoallergenic and nickel-free making this a great choice for those with very sensitive skin. Unlike cheap metals, sterling silver will not irritate your skin. Necklace, 1/8” wide (3.5mm). Strong secure lobster clasp closure.

MADE IN ITALY - Italian jewelry is much more than a fashionable and elegant choice. Its rich history formed a people who strongly value creativity and passion. With a high demand for luxury Italian jewelry, early artisans paved the way for the superior design and quality craftsmanship still used today. High quality standards for fine jewelry in Italy are unmatched by any other country in the world making this a solid investment. Miabella jewelry is authenticated with a 925 Italy trademark.

PERFECT GIFT FOR HIM OR HER - A classic unisex chain with cool elegance for those who value beautiful Italian craftsmanship. This timeless essential is the perfect gift idea for husband, wife, son, daughter, mom, dad, brother, sister, boyfriend, girlfriend, best friend or for you. Give someone special luxurious fine jewelry to wear from day to night with style. VISIT OUR STORE: For a selection of sterling silver necklaces, bracelets, rings, earrings and authentic coin jewelry.

GIFT BOX INCLUDED - Miabella jewelry is shipped in an elegant gift box, ready to treat yourself or a loved one for Birthday, Christmas, Father’s Day, Mother’s Day, Anniversary, Valentine’s Day, Wedding, Graduation and any other holiday or special occasion gifting. 30 day money back guarantee
body.description: Miabella offers affordable fine jewelry, from cool modern to updated classic designs. Make a cool statement with this solid 925 sterling silver 3.5mm Cuban chain. A slim version of our classic Curb, this necklace is great for every day and ready to be worn with everything. Lays flat, smooth and comfortable on the neckline. Made in Italy

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Genuine 925 Sterling silver Crafted of pure 925 sterling silver, this jewelry is a great choice for those with very sensitive skin. One of the brightest metals in the world, sterling silver gives your jewelry a brilliant shine. Sterling silver is hypoallergenic, lead-free, nickel-free and does not irritate your skin.

How to Identify Authentic Sterling Silver Jewelry In accordance with the law, it is required that every silver jewelry purchased must be stamped with the fineness mark 925 and the the registered U.S. company mark. Companies that have their jewelry stamped 925 but missing the company mark is considered unlawful. Miabella stamps all sterling silver jewelry with 925 Italy and either LIRM or Miabella. You can test your jewelry with a magnet. Never test the clasps of chains. Sterling silver clasps have stainless steel springs that will cause the magnet to stick-even if the piece is really gold or silver. Test the piece in the middle, away from the clasp. If the magnet sticks, it’s not gold or silver.

Sterling Silver Cuban Link Chain Our solid, diamond-cut links are the newest version of the classic Cuban chain. The flat beveled design makes the chain more reflective and comfortable for everyday wear. Sterling Silver Jewelry Care To preserve the appearance and longevity, clean your silver jewelry regularly with an anti-tarnish polishing cloth and avoid contact with household chemicals, swimming pools and salt water. Allow perfume, spray or lotion to dry before wearing your jewelry. Do NOT use an anti-tarnish cloth on rhodium plated or gold plated jewelry, instead rub gently with a soft cotton cloth. Store in a dry place. Made in Italy Italian jewelry has the highest government quality standards unmatched by any other country in the world. Miabella jewelry pays homage to the authentic craft of Italian jewelry design, bringing beauty and sophistication of Italian design to everyone.

Protecting the Environment & Sustainability In line with the highest standards, Miabella's entire production aims to minimize the negative effect on the impact on the environment. Miabella packaging is made from recyclable materials. Our silver and gold are 100% recycled, significantly reducing emissions without sacrificing quality.

Protecting the Environment & Sustainability In line with the highest standards, Miabella's entire production aims to minimize the negative effect on the impact on the environment. Miabella packaging is made from recyclable materials. Our silver and gold are 100% recycled, significantly reducing emissions without sacrificing quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shiny, well-made necklace
reviews.reviewText: I gifted my husband this necklace for Christmas. He has received so many compliments on it and loves wearing it. He loves the nice shine to it and how its not oversized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps turning black
reviews.reviewText: Update to previous review. I was contacted by the seller about my son’s experience with the chain we purchased for him. They were extremely helpful in offering possible reasons as to why his chain could be tarnishing. Some I of the possible reasons I was not even aware of. The seller expressed that they wanted us to be satisfied with our purchase and offered to send my son a new chain at no additional cost, which I happily agreed to. When the new item arrived a couple of days later, I was surprised to find that the seller had also included a special cleaning cloth as well as a special cleaning solution! I am so impressed by the fantastic customer service from this seller! They not only made things right, they went above and beyond!! Excellent customer service like this is what will keep customers coming back.We purchased this chain for my son to replace one that broke. It looks nice, but unfortunately, it keeps turning black. My son has to clean it, putting it in a liquid jewelry cleaner almost daily. Not great quality. I wish we would have bought a different one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looked amazing when it first arrived - super shiny
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Miabella Italian 925 Sterling Silver 3.5mm chain, and while it initially looked great and met my style expectations, I have mixed feelings after about 30 days of use. Hence, I'm giving it a 4-star rating.Firstly, the appearance of this chain is stunning. The sterling silver gives it a beautiful shine, and the 3.5mm width is just right for adding a touch of elegance to any outfit. I received compliments on it, and it truly adds a refined look.However, my enthusiasm was short-lived. After approximately 30 days of regular wear, I noticed that the chain had snapped unexpectedly. I was disappointed, as I expected more durability from a sterling silver product. I didn't engage in any strenuous activities while wearing it, so the sudden break was unexpected and frustrating.In terms of style and appearance, this chain is top-notch, but its longevity left me wanting more. While it's possible that I received a defective piece, the durability issue is something to consider. If you're looking for a stylish accessory and are willing to be cautious with its wear and handling, the Miabella Italian 925 Sterling Silver 3.5mm chain might still be worth it. Just be prepared to take extra care to prevent any unexpected mishaps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The chain is nice luminous but it's a little smaller than I thought it would be
reviews.reviewText: Yeah so I got a really nice Cuban Link sterling silver for my father I mean it's 4 oz 4 1/2 oz is super heavy so I just like all right let's do silver cuz I'm sick of gold I'm sick of losing it or whatever stolen robbed so I'm like Silva I think so it was better than gold yet the the look but you got to know what you're buying so the first chain I bought was this chain it's like 3.5 mm which is tiny but it's still a nice chain it's long and it has a pendant but I just got a bracelet that's stone silver 22 g and it's thick and solid and has a different class not a lobster one it's really high end I paid about a buck 60 for this bracelet and that tells you something cuz if you buy a small thin chain you're only going to pay 30 40 bucks but this company's the way to go

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lived up to expectations. As pictured and described.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I cant stop laughing
reviews.reviewText: Other than the shape of the links this is NOTHING like the pictures, which show a solid, sturdy appearing chunky chain. The chain recieved hasvery small links, no weight to it, and the words "delicate' and 'petite' come to mind. Lol, totally not what I was expecting!! I would never in a million years expect a man to wear this, for myself I may end up keeping it because it does appear to be silver and was not terribly expensive. But this link design is made to be more substantial, kind funny looking to be so light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ok it’s actually really nice
reviews.reviewText: the size is great. Seems durable but time will tell. The color is silver but honestly I was bent out of shape because it got tarnished really fast. Now that has nothing to do with the chain itself. Originally I thought I was sold a fake but after some research and cleaning it was back to new. When it comes to wearing silver I’m a noob. The chain is definitely real and it was worth the money
A little small in size but good quality

Ya tiene un par de meses que la compré y sigue muy linda, es súper gruesa, así la pedimos pero no tenía idea del grosor y es excelente, aguantadora, la pedimos larga para que pudiera entrar y salir por la cabeza sin abrir el broche cada vez. Estoy muy contenta con ella. Si acaso, le pondría la contra del broche menos grande, para que más dijes pudieran pasar, para el que era pasó apenitas...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 23, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This 925 sterling silver chain is Beautiful , and is just the right size , my son loves it, but he mentioned there is no Certificate come with the product like some other solid 925 Sterling silver chains .

I guess I did not know much about sterling silver before I bought this necklace. It does tarnish...a lot, but I guess all of them do. You just have to clean them every now and then... Ok. You have have to clean it quite often as mine tarnishes real quick, I say, I have have to clean it once every 3-4 days. I did read the reviews from the previous buyers about the same problem. I have the necklace and pendant from different sellers... both of them tarnish quick...I guess it is just the way things are.

I bought this a few months back for my very active son and he hasn’t broken it yet and it just gets shinnier everyday. He hasn’t taken it off his September. I will be purchasing from this company again.12/10!!!
